Vote by Sunday, July 28.
 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
Vote Today

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

The virtual polling place is now open to cast your vote for our Board of Directors. Eight seats are up for election. Read the slate of candidates and their biographies. Directors will serve a three-year term.

By now you should have received in the mail a postcard from us with your voter identification code, which you will need to cast your online ballot. This ballot will remain open until 11:59 p.m. on Sunday, July 28. If you have any questions regarding the election of the board of directors, please contact us at info@acludc.org or 202-457-0800.

The new board will be announced at our annual membersâ€™ meeting on Tuesday, September 10, 6:30 - 8:30 p.m., and online at acludc.org.

I hope you'll take the time to participate in our election, and I look forward to seeing you at the membership meeting.

Cast your vote today!

Monica Hopkins
Executive Director, ACLU of the District of Columbia
